channel.title: Posts on Welcome, I'm Gary
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Welcome, I'm Gary

item.title: Quuppa Tracking Device and Group Dynamics in Education üè´
item.description: I applied three clustering algorithms, namely k-means clustering, Gaussian Mixture Model (GMM) with expectation maximization, and mean-shift algorithm to analyze the Quuppa tracking location data in order to understand group membership and dynamics in an educational setting.

item.title: Crunchbase Founder Analysis üöÄ
item.description: In this project, I used random forest and XGBoost to classify whether a startup is successful.

item.title: Disaster Tweets Detector
item.description: This project aims to detect tweets that signals disastrous events.

item.title: EHR Symptom Detection üè•
item.description: In this project, I use deep learning to classify symptoms in nursing notes (EHR)

item.title: Influenza-Like Illnesses Map in NYC üçé
item.description: This project visualizes and predicts influenza-like ilnesses in NYC neighborhoods.

item.title: Instacart Market Baskey Analysis üõí
item.description: In this project, I predict next purchases from Instacart’s customer purchases data using XGBoost.

item.title: Whiskey Recommendation Engine ü•É
item.description: In this project, I used content filtering and matrix factorization for a whiskey recommendation prototype.
